quotes.quote: The only people who think children are carefree are the ones who've forgotten their own childhood.
You don't always need a plan. Sometimes you just need to breathe, trust, let go, and see what happens.
There's power in looking silly and not caring that you do.
Nowhere can man find a quieter or more untroubled retreat than in his own soul.
Make the most of your carefree young life as you can.
Taking time to do nothing often brings everything into perspective.
The laughter of the aphorism is sometimes triumphant, but seldom carefree.
Find a way to relax that takes you to a joyful level, a level that quiets the nerves and allows thoughts to be calm.
It was a carefree period and we took to it like genuine lowlife.
He who lives in harmony with himself lives in harmony with the universe.
Being single is nice, drama free, and carefree but it's nice to feel happy with someone you love once in a while.
Being relaxed, at peace with yourself, confident, emotionally neutral loose, and free-floating these are the keys to successful performance in almost everything.
There is an untroubled harmony in everything, a full consonance in nature; only in our illusory freedom do we feel at variance with it.
Withdraw to the untroubled quietude deep within the soul, and refresh yourself.
A carefree letting go of oneself, not a caution, but a wise blindness.
Live with no excuses and love with no regrets.
Let the night take you. Let the stars evaporate into your dreams. Let sleep be the only comfort for you to believe.
Doing what you like is freedom. Liking what you do is happiness.

The more relaxed you are, the better you are at everything: the better you are with your loved ones, the better you are with your enemies, the better you are at your job, the better you are with yourself.

When you are relaxed and you hear what you know is the truth, regardless of your experience, you love. You love the truth. You love hearing, knowing, responding to the truth, because all of that is really you.
He who can be carefree yet mindful at the same time, has found the secret of living in enlightened peace.
Nonchalant putts count the same as chalant putts.
Nonchalance is the ability to remain down to earth when everything else is up in the air.
A life of peace, purity and refinement leads to a calm and untroubled old age
Being free brings a lightness, a carefree surrender to all that is happening around you, and, above all, an acceptance of reality.

Be carefree yet careful: While you should work on overcoming unnecessary worrying, have a healthy fear of danger and sensibly guard yourself from harm. Overcoming worry does not mean putting yourself in danger, but in having a calm attitude in dealing with difficulties and accepting what cannot be changed.
While looking foward, let go of the past, be carefree and life will be a blast.
Those who are close to the wise are granted a carefree, cheerful mind. Look how the lion brought relief to all of the wild animals.
By appearing relaxed and carefree, you not only make other people feel welcome and valuable, but you also radiate the message, 'Of course, I don't look busy. I did it right the first time.'
If you need to start by focusing on how your attitude appears, then appear relaxed and carefree, as if you have time to stop and listen to others.
It is said that unsophistication makes a man empty and that emptiness makes him carefree.
When we understand the meaning of life and death, we no longer need to be afraid of deluded.  It is at this point that our lives can truly be carefree.
If you're carefree and open from within, you can fit in anywhere,  anyway, without having to go to dramatic extremes or make shocking statements.
The point is to be free not to be crazy.
Carefree means being wide open from within, not constricted.
Carefree doesn't mean careless. It is not that you don't care about others, not that you don't have compassion or are unfriendly.
If you're not carefree you keep on bumping up against things.
Everyone knows that dating in your thirties is not the happy-go-lucky free-for-all it was when you were twenty-two.
The essence of the Reagan era has been a combination of unexampled slap happy greed at home and squalid, surreptitious violence overseas.
Creative geniuses are a slap-happy lot, Treat them with respect.

in the back of my mind, I hear my conscious call / the pull the tease of a romance gone wild / feeling as carefree as a little child / snapshot moments of my past / having so much fun with a hope that it would last.
Carefree to be, as a bird that sings; / To go my own sweet way; / To reck not at all what may befall, /  But to live and to love each day.

With cruel winter I am better satisfied, / I love the snows; when in the moonlight / A sleigh ride swift and carefree with a friend. / Who, warm and rosy 'neath a sable mantle, / Burns, trembles as she clasps your hand.
We are all born the innocent / We were born to run carefree / You will live on in the hearts of men / Constantly

She said 'love of my life now I finally see / A carefree way wasn't meant for me / The pain I feel you just can't understand / You'd think it as fire, pull away your hand / But love of my life / When you told me today / That my place was gone in your carefree way / I realized...'
Childhood should be carefree, playing in the sun; not living a nightmare in the darkness of the soul.
If you were a bird and lived on high, / You'd lean on the wind when the wind came by, / You'd say to the wind when it took you away: / That's where I wanted to go today!
Never ever worry about your looks, because it neither matters to those who love you and to those who don't love you. So, what's the need of worrying?
I wish I had not spent my hours worrying over another nickel for the carousel but instead running barefoot through the fields of yellow bonnets.
I can be a goofball sometimes. I love having a good time and being carefree.
A lot of times when you're young and carefree, you don't realize, when you tip over the edge, how difficult it is to climb back in.
An ideal world inhabited b carefree people is nothing more than a utopia.
I love kids—they're so carefree and always put a smile on my face.
When I was a kid, those were carefree days without much pressure.
A good character is the only guarantee of everlasting carefree happiness.
Life is glorious when it is happy. Days are carefree when they are happy.
A life of unremitting caution, without the carefree or even, occasionally the careless— may turn out to be half a life.
